name: Cards on the Table
description:
Build your deck and your pile of chips to take on the house!

The battles are run on poker-like rules:

  1. Each time you draw, the blind is taken from your chip pile and put in the pot
  2. you must play at least one card per turn. Each time you end your turn you get to draw more cards. 
  3. Once one side of the board is filled up, the other player must play the rest of their hand
  4. if you win the hand, your opponent adds the numerical value of your poker hand to the pot
  5. the house takes their cut
  6. you take the pot!

Choose cards wisely and soon the chips will be stacking up!
